entry.title: Where’s Senator Rubio? Call and ask for a Town Hall meeting!

link.title: Where's Senator Rubio? Call and ask for a Town Hall meeting!

entry.content:
[https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/contact] Sen. Marco Rubio told Politico he won’t participate in town hall meetings because political activists will crash them to create a media spectacle of people who “heckle and scream at me in front of cameras.”

Sen. Rubio needs to hear from the people he serves whether they are happy with him or have a complaint.
entry.summary: [https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/contact] Sen. Marco Rubio told Politico he won’t participate in town hall meetings because political activists will crash them to create a media spectacle of people who “heckle and scream at me in front of cameras.”

entry.title: Puerto Rico Relief Fund
entry.content: This is the scene at 2888 Mahan Drive today, where donations to those suffering in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico are being gathered for a private plane flight to that island. Tallahassee’s material response has been wonderful. Now those orchestrating this could use some more physical help in loading the trucks, sorting and packing goods, and cleaning up when all is said and done. They don’t need more material goods right now. But more money is very helpful. You can deliver money to them there, or walk into any Prime Meridian Bank branch in Tallahassee or Thomasville and hand them a check made out to Puerto Rico Relief Fund. These monies will help put fuel into the plane, or maybe even charter a second plane. The pilots are working for free. The Tallahassee lawyer who started this effort – originally from Puerto Rico herself, but living and practicing here now – has relatives in Puerto Rico who will receive and distribute these particular goods much faster than what you hear about on national news right now.
entry.summary: This is the scene at 2888 Mahan Drive today, where donations to those suffering in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico are being gathered for a private plane flight to that island. entry.title: Florida Senate Calendar October 9-13
entry.content: The calendar, as published by the Office of the Senate Secretary, is the official publication containing legislative activities or a list of bills awaiting action on a specific day. The weekly schedule is an allocation of meeting times set by the President and is subject to change.
entry.summary: The calendar, as published by the Office of the Senate Secretary, is the official publication containing legislative activities or a list of bills awaiting action on a specific day. The weekly schedule is an allocation of meeting times set by the President and is subject to change.

entry.title: Stop DeVos: Call Your Representatives!
entry.content:
Specific Asks

  • Oppose Steven Bannon
  • Prevent a Trump Supreme Court nominee
  • No on Sessions (Feinstein still hasn’t committed!)

entry.title: We are Winning Against Trump
entry.content: Across the nation, over 5,800 local groups (at least 2 in every congressional district) are using the Indivisible Guide to hold their members of Congress accountable.
entry.summary: Across the nation, over 5,800 local groups (at least 2 in every congressional district) are using the Indivisible Guide to hold their members of Congress accountable.
